fields.name: Client_Ids
fields.helpText: Please add each Client Id on the separate lines. Please do not add blank lines or spaces.

fields.name: CaseSearchFields
fields.fieldText:
Case Search Fields

Please fill out the fields to filter cases to auto solve.

fields.name: Case_Status
fields.helpText: If you would like to select multiple values you can use hold "Command" on your keyboard to select individual options or hold "Shift" to select a range.

fields.name: Tax_Notice_Period
fields.helpText: If you would like to select multiple values you can use hold "Command" on your keyboard to select individual options or hold "Shift" to select a range.

fields.name: I_would_like_to_input_a_range_of_Tax_Notice_Date
fields.fieldText: I would like to input a range of Tax Notice Date

validationRule.errorMessage: Please include a date since you have selected you would like to input a date range.
Please include a date since you have selected you would like to input a date range.

fields.name: I_would_like_to_input_a_range_of_Tax_Notice_Amounts
fields.fieldText: I would like to input a range of Tax Notice Amounts

validationRule.errorMessage: Please provide a Tax Notice Amount range since you have requested to select a range of Tax Notice Amounts.
Please provide a Tax Notice Amount range since you have requested to select a range of Tax Notice Amounts.

fields.name: Copy_1_of_Package_Name
fields.helpText: Please do not edit the Package Name. After a package has been created you are unable to change the name for tracking.

fields.name: Would_you_like_to_update_Agency_Information
fields.fieldText: Would you like to update Agency Information?

fields.name: Copy_1_of_Case_Status
fields.helpText: If you would like to select multiple values you can use hold "Command" on your keyboard to select individual options or hold "Shift" to select a range.

fields.name: Copy_1_of_Tax_Notice_Period
fields.helpText: If you would like to select multiple values you can use hold "Command" on your keyboard to select individual options or hold "Shift" to select a range.

fields.name: Copy_1_of_Tax_Notice_Start_Date
fields.helpText: Please add a date that is not greater than Tax Notice End Date.

fields.name: Copy_1_of_Tax_Notice_End_Date
fields.helpText: Please add a date that is not less than Tax Notice Start Date.

fields.name: Copy_1_of_Lowest_Amount
fields.helpText: Please add an amount that is not greater than Highest Tax Notice Amount.

fields.name: Copy_1_of_Highest_Amount
fields.helpText: Please add an amount that is not less than Lowest Tax Notice Amount.

fields.name: Client_Ids_Edit
fields.helpText: Please add each Client Id on the separate lines. Please do not add blank lines or spaces.

fields.fieldText:
{!Package_Name}


You can close this tab to see your changes or find it in the Active Package List view. Please refresh your screen to show updates.
